title: Big Gig
brief_description: A humorous driver training video which is directed at young drivers in need of more driving experience. The video, through the use of humour, science fiction and rock music, positively reinforces correct approaches to drinking. It covers issues such as the difficulties of night driving, the problems of peer group pressure and the effects of alcohol on driving.
